verses.name: Jeremiah 18:6
verses.text: O house of Israel, cannot I do with you as this potter? saith the Lord. Behold, as the clay is in the potter’s hand, so are ye in mine hand, O house of Israel.

verses.name: Jeremiah 18:7
verses.text: At what instant I shall speak concerning a nation, and concerning a kingdom, to pluck up, and to pull down, and to destroy it;

verses.name: Jeremiah 18:8
verses.text: If that nation, against whom I have pronounced, turn from their evil, I will repent of the evil that I thought to do unto them.
